entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23 with temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 23 with temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
